text: i love the 3rd panel when roast beef is really, really annoyed in that nine inch nails way

name: connellingus
text: Molly should know better than to hang up on Beef so abruptly. Even without the Volvo of Despair, he doesn't seem like the type who would take it well.

name: afkpuz
text: His eyes are large.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Shoot a cop, Buy a nose on Ebay ... Heyo!

That's a trifecta of hilarious. Oh God, Onstad, you're the man.

name: relaxing
text: nothing can stop me now, 'cause i don't care anymore / nothing can stop me now 'cause i just don't care

name: mustakrakesh
text: Build it up now tear it apart now jump real high and fall down real far.

name: art-vader
text:
I'm all alone in the world you must despise
(Hey God) I believed your promises, your promises and lies!

name: cailetshadow
text:
I'll be dead by the time they slap the cuffs on!

Nothing pisses cops off more than having to drag a corpse down to the county jail and fill out their half of all the paperwork too.

name: tekende
text: Ben Stiller here kinda looks like Peter Murphy, back in the Bela Lugosi's Dead days.

text: The impression of a butt uses the word "Hey-o" in a situation of this sorts. That is an instant 5.

name: raticus
text: I used to say "Owp" often - like if you're rounding a corner and narrowly avoid bumping into someone. It's like a simultaneous expression of surprise and apology. Pronouced "ope!"
